H0.text: The nervous and respiratory systems maintain the level of glucose in the blood.

H1.text: Digestive and endocrine systems maintain the level of glucose in the blood.

H2.text: Muscular and immune systems maintain the level of glucose in the blood.

H3.text: Skeletal and cardiac systems maintain the level of glucose in the blood.

A4.text: Pancreas contain nearly 1 to 2 million islets of Langerhans (a tissue which consists cells that secrete hormones) and acini.
